text: Enea Zuffi was an Italian football player. He played as a forward in 21 games. He was born in Turin on 27 December 1891. In the 1912 Summer Olympics, he played for Italy. He died on 14 July 1968. ==References== *Profile at FIGC.it *Profile at myJuve.it *Profile at FootballDatabase.eu Category:1891 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Footballers from Turin Category:Olympians for Italy
title: Enea Zuffi
